title: 5.4 Arrive Steering
description: It’s finally time for me to tackle a JavaScript (p5.js) implementation of the “arrival” steering behavior from Craig Reynolds’ 1999 paper Steering Behaviors For Autonomous Characters!

codeExamples.title: Arrive
codeExamples.description: Using the arrive steering method to code an agent that arrives at the mouse's position

links.title: Steering Behaviors for Autonomous Characters
links.description: Craig Reynolds' paper on different styles of steering behaviors for characters in animation and games
